{"id":1186818486,"question_id":3325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1708959331,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"585 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1186818486/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Largest Area of Square Inside Two Rectangles","memory":"58.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    using ll = long long;\n    using pii = pair<int, int>;\n    using vi = vector<int>;\n    \n    int common(vi& bL0, vi& tR0, vi& bL1, vi& tR1){\n        if(bL0[0] > tR1[0] || bL1[0] > tR0[0] || bL0[1] > tR1[1] || bL1[1] > tR0[1]) return 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        int x[4] = {bL0[0], tR0[0], bL1[0], tR1[0]};\n        int y[4] = {bL0[1], tR0[1], bL1[1], tR1[1]};\n        sort(x, x + 4);\n        sort(y, y + 4);\n        ans = min(x[2] - x[1], y[2] - y[1]);\n        return ans;\n    }\n    \n    long long largestSquareArea(vector<vector<int>>& bottomLeft, vector<vector<int>>& topRight) {\n        int n = bottomLeft.size();\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){\n            for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++){\n                int c = common(bottomLeft[i], topRight[i], bottomLeft[j], topRight[j]);\n                ans = max(ans, c);\n            }\n        }\n        return ll(ans) * ll(ans);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-largest-area-of-square-inside-two-rectangles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
